title: Intensive Short-Term Workshop for Enhancing Discussion-Based Learning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in social science theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: A discussion-based learning process for field practitioners to improve critical thinking and communication skills, with a smartphone-enabled environment for supplementary material sharing.

learning_goals: During discussions, learners can demonstrate logical reasoning skills with at least 80% participation.
Learners can achieve a critical thinking application score of 3.5 or higher (on a 4-point scale) during peer evaluations.
Through role-assigned discussions, learners can produce in-depth analysis reports on complex social issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
